version_description:
What's New in This Version Describe what's new in this version of your app, such as new features, improvements, and bug fixes.
Thank you for using Al Rajhi Mobile this release brings:

- Apply for Virtual Card
- Local transfer now have an option that allows next business day transfer
- Account to Cash transfer
- Enhance overall app performance

What's New in This Version Describe what's new in this version of your app, such as new features, improvements, and bug fixes.

- Your safety is our priority, now you can apply for Takaful car insurance via the app

- Enhance overall app performance

Thank you for using Al Rajhi Mobile this release brings:

-Introduction of new colorful theme
-Added Accessibility via voice-over commands for people with special needs
-Revamped and enhanced the landing page
-Now you can change the default minimum payment percentage for credit cards
-Now you can add your account details to apple wallet for easy access
-Now you will be notified once your financing application is approved
-Improved the experience for government payments
-Finding nearest Branch/ATM became easier
-Overall bug fixes and performance improvements
